name: Beach Volley Beasts
description:
Choose one of four cute animals and try to keep the volleyballs away from your goal in this fun local multiplayer 4-players party game!

You can play with your friends with a single keyboard, here are the controls:

  • Menus 
    • Arrow Keys/A and D - Select
    • Spacebar/Enter - Confirm
    • Backspace/Escape - Go Back/Pause (during gameplay)
  • Gameplay
    • Player 1 - A and D
    • Player 2 - J and L
    • Player 3 - Left and Right Arrow Keys
    • Player 4 - Numpad4 and Numpad6

This is the first game I've ever finished and published. I worked on it for almost a month and made everything myself, from the colorful cartoony graphics to the programming (music and sound effects not included).

The A.I. is not the best so playing with some friends is recommended, you can use softwares like Parsec to play with far away friends.

Also, if you find bugs or any other problem with the game please let me know so I can promptly fix any issues you might have.

Enjoy the game and, if you feel like I deserve it, consider a small donation. Thank you and have fun!
